Tinting corrects colours in brickwork, stone and concrete.

By creating bespoke tints and applying them with a keen eye, we are able to disguise ugly repairs, unite extensions with the original building or perhaps create a whole new appearance throughout. This process provides a very natural, durable colour change.

See some examples

Just wanted to say that we are absolutely delighted with your work. It has totally transformed the front of our house and even on close examination you simply cannot tell the new bricks from the old. Wow! Wish we had known about your services years ago.

A. Cuffe SUTTON SM2, UK

It looks so natural since tinting that we often forget what it looked like before. It really is an art in itself, there is no distinction between the original and the tinted bricks. Beautifully done!

A. Kuiper BUSSUM, NL
Natural & Durable
The tinting process we adopt is well established and has a long history of use. Treated masonry appears and behaves similarly to it’s untreated neighbours.
20 years Guarantee
In most situations, we are able to offer a 20 year guarantee to cover for clear colour loss during this period. Please enquire for details.
Artistic Approach
Bricks are usually treated individually so as to introduce the correct variety of colours, tones and patterns. The mortar colour can also be adjusted to ensure the best possible match is achieved.
Knowledge & Experience
With many years of experience in both tinting and building conservation / restoration in general, we are well placed to offer you an honest appraisal of the possible options.
